name: vscode-simply-css-formatter
description: Simply CSS formatter using Clean CSS

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint

simplyCss.configs.description: 'simple' | 'pretty' | 'custom' Predefined configurations. Ignores fine grained settings. Default: 'simple'
enumDescriptions: Selectors and rules on a single line

simplyCss.format.general.breakWith.description: Character used for line endings. Default: 'auto'

simplyCss.format.general.semicolonAfterL.description: controls removing trailing semicolons in rule;. Default: true

simplyCss.format.general.indentBy.description: controls number of characters to indent with. Default: 2

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterAtRule.description: line break after an at-rule: @charset. Default: false

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterBlockBegin.description: line break after a block begins: `@media`. Default: false

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterBlockEnds.description: line break after a block ends. Default: false

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterComment.description: line break after a comment. Default: true

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterProperty.description: line break after a property. Default: false

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterRuleBegins.description: line break after an opening rule brace. Default: false

simplyCss.format.newLine.afterRuleEnds.description: line break after a ending rule brace. Default: true

simplyCss.format.newLine.beforeBlockEnds.description: line break before a block ends. Default: false

simplyCss.format.newLine.betweenSelector.description: line break between selectors. Default: false

simplyCss.format.spaces.aroundSelectorRe.description: spaces around selector relations: div > a -vs- div>a. Default: true

simplyCss.format.spaces.beforeBlockBegin.description: spaces before a block begins: .block { -vs- .block{. Default: false

simplyCss.format.spaces.beforeValue.description: spaces before a value: width: 1rem -vs- width:1rem. Default: true
